page.title: 13ECONOMICS IN MELBOURNE
page.content: THERE ARE TWO BANKS IN MELBOURNE,THE NATIONAL WESTMINSTER AND THE MIDLAND BANKS,AND BOTH ARE SITUATED IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE.LIKE ALL MODERN TOWNS MELBOURNE HAS ITS FAIR SHARE OF BUILDING SOCIETIES.THERE ARE BRANCHES OF THE DERBYSHIRE,ABBEY NATIONAL, HALIFAX AND TOWN AND COUNTRY BUILDING SOCIETIES.IN THE MARKET PLACE IS MCGREGORS ACCOUNTANCY COMPANY WHICH DEALS WITH ALL MONEY MATTERS AND PARTICULARLY WITH COMPANY FINANCES.THE POST OFFICE OFFERS VARIED FINANCIAL SERVICES.INSURANCE MATTERS ARE DEALT WITH BY RYAN,BENSON & CO.LTD. REGISTERED INSURANCE BROKERS.THERE ARE TWO ESTATE AGENTS WHO WILL SELL YOUR HOUSE FOR YOU;RICHARD SNEAD & CO. AND MAYNARDS & CO.
